descript.abstract: This is a collaboration between City of Los Angeles Mayor's Office, StreetsLA, and USC. To consolidate / aggregate many datasets for Street Sweeping. Task 2: to perform spatial join between Centerlines and Biweekly Posted Routes.
descript.purpose: This is a collaboration between City of Los Angeles Mayor's Office, StreetsLA, and USC. To consolidate / aggregate many datasets for Street Sweeping. Task 3: to perform spatial join between Centerlines and Biweekly Posted Routes.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
